Our crew uses industry-standard materials (asphalt shingles, metal, tile, TPO, EPDM) and follows manufacturer guidelines for warranties and code compliance.

lists.title: Residential Roof Replacement
lists.shortDescription: Complete tear-off and replacement for asphalt, tile, metal, and composite roofs for single-family homes.

  • Benefits:

lists.h2: What Is a Residential Roof Replacement in San Diego, CA
lists.p2: A residential roof replacement replaces worn or damaged roofing materials to restore waterproofing and structural protection. IB Roofing inspects decking and underlayment, recommends the best materials for your home (architectural shingles, clay/concrete tile, or metal), and completes the job with professional flashing, ventilation upgrades, and debris removal. Contact IB Roofing at [phone] to schedule a roof evaluation or estimate.
lists.tyesHeading: When Do You Need a Residential Roof Replacement in San Diego, CA?
lists.overViewContent:
• Common Issues That Trigger Replacement:

    • Widespread shingle failure or curling

    • Repeated leaks or rot in roof decking

    • Age beyond manufacturer warranty (typically 20–30 years for shingles)

What's Included:

  • Full roof inspection and written estimate

  • Tear-off (if required), new underlayment, flashing, ridge vents

  • Proper hauling and disposal of old materials

  • Manufacturer and workmanship warranty documentation

Typical Project Duration:
1–4 days depending on roof size and complexity
Typical roof area covered: 1,200–3,000 sq ft
